page.title: 07ASPECTS OF FAMILY LIFE (1)
page.content: LIFESTYLE IN A LARGELY RURAL AREA SUCH AS THIS ONE TENDS TO BE OF A HIGH QUALITY COMPARED WITH MANY URBAN ONES. SEVERAL OF THE MORE REMOTE HOUSES IN THIS AREA REPRESENT THE VILLAGE OF CHAPEL BRAMPTON WHICH IS ADJACENT TO PITSFORD BUT IS SITUATED IN ANOTHER GRID. MR. COWLEY'S FARM IS ONE SUCH PROPERTY. INTERVIEWS WITH SEVERAL FAMILIES SPREAD THROUGHOUT THE AREA REVEAL MANY COMMON PATTERNS OF FAMILY LIFE. MANY FAMILIES COMPRISE MOTHER, FATHER AND TWO CHILDREN WHOSE AGES ARE FROM TWO TO FOUR YEARS APART. FATHER IS USUALLY THE FAMILY PROVIDER AND FREQUENTLY TRAVELS TO WORK IN NEARBY NORTHAMPTON. HE WILL OFTEN SPEND HIS WEEKENDS PLAYING SPORT, GARDENING AND ENJOYING FAMILY LIFE. THE ANNUAL HOLIDAY IS A TIME IN WHICH FAMILIES TRAVEL AND STAY IN A HOTEL.
